Get Artists

Get artists by genre

Get Artist Albums

geniusR

gen_song_url()

Create Genius url

gen_album_url()

Create Genius Album url

genius_album()

Retrieve song lyrics for an album

genius_lyrics()

Retrieve song lyrics from Genius.com

genius_tracklist()

Create a tracklist of an album

genius_url()

Use Genius url to retrieve lyrics

prep_info() prep_info()

Prepares input strings for `gen_song_url()`

add_genius()

Add lyrics to a data frame

possible_album()

Form of genius_album that can handle errors

possible_lyrics()

Form of genius_lyrics that can handle errors

get_album_data()

Retrieve artist discography with song lyrics and audio info

get_discography()

Retrieve artist discography with song lyrics and audio info

Playlists

create_playlist()

Create playlists

add_to_playlist()

Add tracks to a playlist

get_playlists()

Get playlists

get_user_playlist_count()

Get count of Spotify playlists for a given user

get_user_playlists()

Get user playlists

get_user_audio_features()

Get features and popularity for all of a user's playlists on Spotify

get_playlist_tracks()

Get tracks from one or more playlists

get_playlist_audio_features()

Get features and popularity for all of a given set of playlists on Spotify

Tracks

get_tracks()

Get track uris from a string search on Spotify

get_track_audio_analysis()

Get track audio analysis by URI

get_track_audio_features()

get_track_popularity()

Get popularity of one or more tracks on Spotify

Get Spotify Authorization Code

get_my_currently_playing()

Get currently playing track for current user

get_my_recently_played()

Get recently played tracks for current user

get_my_top_artists()

get_my_top_tracks()
